name: Mojito
desc: A refreshing cocktail made with mint, lime, and rum.
details: Mojito is a classic Cuban cocktail prepared with fresh mint leaves, lime juice, sugar, soda water, and white rum. Commonly enjoyed in summer, it is known for its refreshing quality.

name: Margarita
desc: A classic cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and triple sec.
details: Margarita is a popular cocktail made with tequila, fresh lime juice, and triple sec. Often served with a salted rim and ice, it’s known for its sweet and sour balance.

name: Cosmopolitan
desc: Made with vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime.
details: Cosmopolitan is a chic cocktail made with vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime juice. It has a vibrant pink color and is served chilled in a martini glass.

name: Pina Colada
desc: A tropical drink made with pineapple juice, coconut milk, and rum.
details: Pina Colada is a sweet tropical cocktail made by blending pineapple juice, coconut milk or cream, and rum with ice. It’s creamy, fruity, and perfect for beach vibes.

name: Martini
desc: Made by mixing gin or vodka with red vermouth.
details: Martini is a timeless classic cocktail made by mixing gin or vodka with vermouth. Often garnished with an olive or a lemon twist, it’s known for its elegance and strength.

name: Aperol Spritz
desc: An Italian cocktail made with Aperol, prosecco, and soda.
details: Aperol Spritz is a light and bubbly Italian cocktail made with Aperol, prosecco, and soda water. It's known for its bittersweet taste and orange hue.

name: Whiskey Sour
desc: Made with bourbon whiskey, lemon juice, and sugar syrup.
details: Whiskey Sour is a classic cocktail combining bourbon whiskey, fresh lemon juice, and sugar syrup. Often served over ice and optionally topped with egg white foam.

name: Espresso Martini
desc: Made with vodka, coffee liqueur, and fresh espresso.
details: Espresso Martini is a modern cocktail made with vodka, coffee liqueur, and freshly brewed espresso. It's bold, rich, and perfect for coffee lovers.

name: Long Island Iced Tea
desc: Made with vodka, tequila, rum, gin, triple sec, and cola.
details: Long Island Iced Tea is a strong and flavorful cocktail made with vodka, tequila, rum, gin, triple sec, lemon juice, and a splash of cola. Despite its name, it contains no tea.

name: Negroni
desc: A bitter-sweet classic made with Campari, gin, and red vermouth.
details: Negroni is an iconic Italian cocktail made with equal parts Campari, gin, and sweet vermouth. It's known for its bold flavor and bright red color, usually garnished with orange peel.

name: Caipirinha
desc: Brazil's national drink made with cachaça, lime, and sugar.
details: Caipirinha is a refreshing Brazilian cocktail made with cachaça, lime wedges, and sugar. It’s served over crushed ice and is known for its bold and tangy flavor.

name: Bloody Mary
desc: A bold cocktail made with tomato juice, vodka, and spices.
details: Bloody Mary is prepared with vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco, black pepper, and celery. It is typically served as a brunch drink.

name: Mai Tai
desc: A sweet and sour classic with rum, lime, and orange liqueur.
details: Mai Tai is a tropical tiki cocktail made with dark rum, lime juice, curaçao, and orgeat syrup. It's fruity, exotic, and perfect for summer.

name: White Russian
desc: A smooth cocktail with vodka, coffee liqueur, and cream.
details: White Russian is made by layering cream over a mix of vodka and coffee liqueur. It's sweet, rich, and indulgent.

name: Sangria
desc: A Spanish drink made with wine and fresh fruits.
details: Sangria is a Spanish punch made with red (or white) wine, orange juice, brandy, and seasonal fruits. It is served cold and great for sharing.

name: Berry Mocktail
desc: A non-alcoholic refreshment made with mixed berries.
details: This fruity mocktail is made with strawberries, blackberries, lime juice, and sparkling water. It’s refreshing and alcohol-free.

name: Gin Fizz
desc: A refreshing classic made with gin, lemon juice, and soda.
details: Gin Fizz is a fizzy and light cocktail made with gin, fresh lemon juice, sugar syrup, and soda. It has a bubbly texture and bright citrus flavor.

name: Tequila Sunrise
desc: A colorful, sweet drink made with tequila, orange juice, and grenadine.
details: Tequila Sunrise is known for its stunning gradient appearance, made with tequila, fresh orange juice, and grenadine syrup. It’s sweet and easy to enjoy.

name: Bramble
desc: A modern classic with gin, blackberry liqueur, and lemon juice.
details: Bramble is made with gin, fresh lemon juice, sugar syrup, and blackberry liqueur. It has a fruity and tart flavor profile with a hint of sweetness.

name: Citrus Mint Cooler
desc: A summer mocktail with lime, orange, and mint.
details: This non-alcoholic cooler combines fresh lime, orange juice, mint, and soda. It’s revitalizing and perfect for hot days.

name: Old Fashioned
desc: A classic made with bourbon whiskey, sugar, and bitters.
details: Old Fashioned is one of the oldest known cocktails, made with bourbon, a sugar cube, a few dashes of Angostura bitters, and an orange peel for garnish.

name: Manhattan
desc: A classic bar cocktail with rye whiskey, vermouth, and bitters.
details: Manhattan is made by stirring rye whiskey (or bourbon), sweet red vermouth, and Angostura bitters with ice. Served in a cocktail glass and garnished with a cherry.

name: Daiquiri
desc: A simple yet elegant cocktail with rum, lime juice, and sugar.
details: Classic Daiquiri is made by shaking white rum, fresh lime juice, and sugar syrup with ice. It's served chilled and has a tropical, refreshing flavor.

name: Amaretto Sour
desc: A sweet-and-sour classic with Amaretto, lemon juice, and syrup.
details: Amaretto Sour combines almond-flavored Amaretto liqueur with fresh lemon juice and sugar syrup. It’s smooth and easy to drink.

name: Cuba Libre
desc: A classic mix of rum, lime juice, and cola.
details: Cuba Libre is made with white rum, freshly squeezed lime juice, and cola. It's refreshing and very easy to enjoy, often served with lime wedge.

name: French 75
desc: An elegant cocktail with gin, lemon juice, sugar, and champagne.
details: French 75 combines gin, fresh lemon juice, and sugar syrup topped with champagne. It’s fizzy, citrusy, and perfect for celebrations.

name: Paloma
desc: A light and refreshing drink made with tequila and grapefruit juice.
details: Paloma is made with tequila, fresh grapefruit juice, lime, and soda water. It balances sweet, sour, and slightly bitter flavors beautifully.

name: Tom Collins
desc: A classic and refreshing cocktail with gin, lemon, syrup, and soda.
details: Tom Collins is made with gin, fresh lemon juice, sugar syrup, and soda water. It's served over ice in a tall glass and garnished with lemon slice or cherry.

name: Bellini
desc: A light, fruity cocktail made with peach purée and prosecco.
details: Bellini is an Italian brunch cocktail made with fresh peach purée and sparkling prosecco. It’s slightly sweet and bubbly with elegant fruity notes.

name: Dark 'n Stormy
desc: A spicy and strong drink with dark rum and ginger beer.
details: Dark 'n Stormy is made by combining dark rum and ginger beer, often garnished with lime. It’s bold, slightly spicy, and very refreshing.

name: Mint Julep
desc: A refreshing classic with mint, bourbon, and sugar.
details: Mint Julep is a traditional Southern cocktail made with bourbon whiskey, fresh mint leaves, sugar, and crushed ice. It's popular during the summer, especially at the Kentucky Derby.

name: Blue Lagoon
desc: A tropical and colorful cocktail with vodka, blue curaçao, and lemonade.
details: Blue Lagoon catches the eye with its vibrant blue color. It’s made with vodka, blue curaçao liqueur, and lemonade, offering a fruity and refreshing taste.

name: Mango Chili Mocktail
desc: An exotic mocktail with mango purée, lime, and a hint of chili.
details: This alcohol-free drink blends mango purée, fresh lime juice, chili powder, and soda water. It offers a sweet, sour, and lightly spicy tropical experience.
